text.welcomeText: Hi, this is Tony for the Next Door Pub & Pizzeria I’m here to help!
text.welcomeText1: Would you like to order a pizza today?
text.welcomeText2: Tony from the Next Door Pub & Pizzeria is here to help!
text.welcomeText3: Do you want order what you ordered last time or are you in the mood for something else?
text.askPhoneNumber: Perfect! What is your phone number?
text.morePizza: Great would you like any other pizzas?
text.sides: Would you like an order of Garlic Bread for $3.50 plus Tax?
text.confirmOrder: We will text you back with confirmation of your order.
text.orderReady: Awesome! Your order will be ready in about 30 mins.
text.textClub: Would you like to join our text club for faster service and specials in the future?
text.finishText: Great! Hope you have a great day

addPizzaText.type: Great! What Kind of pizza would you like? CLICK HERE TO SEE OUR PIZZA MENU. https://goo.gl/JcBdbu
addPizzaText.toppings: Perfect! Would you like any additional toppings? CLICK HERE FOR A LIST OF TOPPINGS https://goo.gl/xQt6ij

text.fallbackText1: We’re sorry but we’re having trouble. To better serve you, give us a call us at 262-248-9551 and we’ll be happy to help!
text.fallbackText2: We’re sorry, but we only offer Pizza ordering for now. Do you like ordering this way, if so Reply YES and we’ll get thinking on adding the entire menu
text.fallbackText3: We aren't able to process your order, please give us a call at: (262) 248-9551 or type Start Over.
text.agentFallbackText: Please send input in correct format. SEND YES <orderId> or NO <orderId>.
text.agentFallbackText1: Order is already picked by an agent.
